summary:
Currently driving the digital transformation in B2B eCommerce from Unilever Icecream side as Data Analytics & Customer Experience Lead. Prior to it, I've initiated our retail market entries for Unilever brands as Global Business Development in Global Retail Development. Before joining Unilever, I held the position of Global Business Development Manager in the Global Headquarters of AIESEC International, a position I got with persistence and dedication to my work. 
I started building my corporate career at 21 years old in Poland after graduating from Marketing & Comm Sciences in Romania.  From Market expansion manager in Poland to Business Development Manager and Country Director in Romania, I grew in PROFIT system gaining experience in marketing, product development, business strategy, process optimization and innovation, project management and risk management.
With work experience in 6 countries and by starting a company at only 22 years old, I developed a strategic approach for limiting risks, customer engagement and financial returns. I am very action oriented and self-driven with a strong ability to communicate effectively with executive teams and business audiences.
My unique combination of creativity and analytical skills makes me a great asset to any organization: corporate and non-corporate.
Strengths : Business Strategy, Data Analytics, Project management, SDGs Corporate Strategy, Retail market entry
Soft Skills: Self Driven, Intercultural communication, Resilience, Commitment and Personal involvement

education.field_of_study: Comunication and Public Relations, Recruitment and employer branding

awards.title: Best Performance Award
awards.description:
Achieving high performance on Project Management and Incoming Global Community Development Programmes in AIESEC Thailand.
 The recognition was given due to the fact that we overachieved our midterm goals. In just 6 months we already achieved +180 internships which is a growth of 27% compare the last year performance in the end of the term.

awards.title: Delegate for International Congress in Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
awards.description:
Representing Thailand in International Congress 2013, Sharm El-Sheikh, Egypt

International Congress is one of the biggest youth Congress that attended more than 800 Delegates from more than 124 Countries.

awards.title: Best gROw Project Winter 2012 - 2013
awards.description:
National reward for having the best performance overachieving all the project goals from all 14 cities participating in the competition.

GROW is the nationwide youth development program that  represents a long term, non-formal educational engagement designed to improve the quality of education in Romania.
Organized by School of Values in partnership with AIESEC, gROw project addresses high school students in Romania (age 14-18). The program offers high school students a professionally designed educational curriculum that complements the formal education system. It has been developed with the support of an Educational Board, gathering personalities and top-notch experts in education and adolescent psychology, especially to address key needs of the development of teenager participant.
So far gROw has received 4 distinctions from which the most honorable is : 
The Best Educational Programme in Romania given during - Charlemagne Awards by the European Parliament in both years: 2011 and 2012

- See more at: http://www.growedu.ro/about/awards/#sthash.1DoWAPoA.dpuf
- See more at: http://www.growedu.ro/

organizations.name: AIESEC Thailand
organizations.position: Incoming Global Community Development Programme Director

projects.title: Thailand Youth to Business Forum 2014
projects.description:
Youth to Business is an initiative powered by AIESEC. We aim to connect young leaders and businesses around relevant topics to generate new, actionable ideas and thoughts about the future. Also, the delegates learned about how these organizations did business social responsibility as part of their commitment to be responsible to their surroundings.

This year our theme is "Innovation of Entrepreneur & Social Responsibility"

What do we do?
1.Connecting the youth in Thailand to business world to build professional attitudes to be globally competitive
2. Providing platform to business practices to access the youth opinions, creative ideas, trends,and interests
3. Building mutual relationship between youth and business practices to create innovative solutions and sustainable acts together to answer the social needs in Thailand

projects.title: gROw
projects.description:
It all starts blank. But remember all the shapes are prepared within. While you fold the paper into the shape you want, consider what the paper aspires to become. Following the path of the amazing Origami art, GROW tries to provide teens with the proper environment and skills to discover their inner strenghts and better shape things to come….
Started in 2011 and organized in partnership with MINISTERUL EDUCAŢIEI, CERCETĂRII, TINERETULUI ŞI SPORTULUI and THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT, GROW won 2 national and 2 international awards showing how useful and entertaining this program really is.

profile_positions.description:
Leading the Digital Analytics & Customer Experience Transformation for Global Ice Cream B2B business. 
- Create a data governance framework and roadmap for analytics, giving guidance where required to drive accelerated digital growth across + 20 markets 
- Improve Customer Experience & Retention Rates by Optimizing Web/App Experience leveraging Data Analytics & A/B testing
- Closely work with internal IT & partners to develop performance dashboards and visualizations to ensure markets are leveraging available data for funnel conversion optimization, identify opportunities for improvement
- Land technologies to capture data, measure and analyze current marketing channels and campaign performance to enhance effectiveness & ROI
- Upskill markets Digital Hubs ( +20) to design experiments, test & validate opportunities via Personalization or A/B testing and researching new data sources.
profile_positions.title: Global CX & Data Analytics Lead

profile_positions.description:
* Development of Unilever retail brands through business partnerships and real estate management
* Developing business plans for retail to fit brand's marketing campaigns & ambitions;
* Supporting the digital transformation of our retail stores by using new IT tools iAuditor, Myagi (Carte d'Or) and educate markets on e-commerce opportunities with IC Now
* GRO Sustainability Warrior: Sustainability assessment of store footprint and setting sustainability KPIs (business cases, PLE, reinforcing circular economy through partnerships)
* Project Management (Prince 2, Agile/Scrum): Lead bringing new store concepts to execution for our retail brands (Ayush, Magnum)
* Provide enabling environment for complementing the retail business plan strategically developed towards better profit-making and fulfilling the Unilever Compass 
* Leading approval process for new stores with internal stakeholders and consulting markets on necessary analysis such as: Business cases development, long term financial projections, Initial Capex estimation
profile_positions.title: Global Business Development - Global Retail

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for account delivery in the partnership development team by coordinating talent sourcing strategies and conference partnership engagements. With responsibilities from network management to coordinating the delivery of our partnerships and organizing corporate events, she has mastered skills such as customer experience mapping to partnership delivery frameworks.
Key achievements:
- Coordinate the contracts and invoicing of current AIESEC global partners ( €600K +)
- Account Management & Service Design: Coordinated the partnerships delivery strategies resulting growing our portfolio with a new partnerships (customer empathy map and persona design)
- CSR & Product development: Feed the Planet- Sustainability Project Electrolux, Asian Development Bank, Ubiquity University, other Employer Branding tools
- Facilitating logistics for global events (Poland - 800 attendees, the Netherlands - 250 attendees, Colombia - 700 attendees) 
- Management of virtual support team for products improvements, talent sourcing strategies and reporting
- Event Management: Organize and deliver the Annual Global Partners Meeting in Brussels, Belgium, European Partnership Vice-Presidents Summit
- Coaching and skill training for the virtual support team and national PD directors of European Entites (+40) & Conference/Summit Management
- Different stakeholder management: contract owners, CEO, CFO, Global VP HR, Hiring Managers

profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing and Content Development Manager

profile_positions.description:
Specialization: Organizational Strategy, Project Management, International Relations& Marketing, Event Management, CSR Product Development, Community Development, International Volunteers Recruitment, Risk Management.
Resposibilities:
- Business Model Canvas: National Strategic Planning for our 7 local offices (increased our national operations by 133%)
- New product development - Market research & developing new collaborations with Red Cross, Rakaew Foundation, UNDP Bangkok
- CSR Product Development: Create Projects on Social Community Development based on Needs & Opportunities analysis in Thailand , ensure a volunteer supply pool through AIESEC international recruitment (+131% growth = +350 Volunteers June ‘13- June ‘14)
- International Relations& Marketing: International Partnerships and Marketing campaigns to
enable our international volunteers’ recruitment.
- Sales : Corporate partnerships in co-delivery community development projects
- Risk Management: Risk Management Strategy, Minimum Quality Standards Guideline, Intensive preparation for all organizing teams (local, national and international), PR activities
- Customer Empathy Mapping: understanding the pains of our target market and designing ( Design thinking process) new project proposals
-  Design Thinking: Ideate and Prototype several projects before selecting the most impactful and sustainable option to fulfill the market needs
- Product Innovation: Implemented a new project delivery framework, quarterly Needs Assessment analysis to optimize our processes (project expanding to 4 new region, +70 schools, 4 NGOs)
- Conference management and Coaching: +80 sessions delivered + chair

The position is for 2013 - 2014 and it will officially end on 30th of June 2014.

company.name: S.C. PROFIT system franchise services S.R.L.

profile_positions.company: S.C. PROFIT system franchise services S.R.L.
profile_positions.description:
- Market Expansion Manager September 2011 - April 2012 ( working in PROFIT system office in Warsaw, Poland )
- Marketing - support recruitment campaigns for new franchisors 
- Managing the company's expansion by starting the office in Romania in April 2012 
- Supporting the development of the franchise sector in Romania 
- Created the business model ( Business Model Canvas) after market research, customer journey mapping, benchmarking analysis for the company's expansion to Romania
- Customer Empathy Mapping & Design Thinking: Developed communication strategies and marketing tools for franchisee recruitment through our online platform
- Service design and Product development: using the customer empathy map designed the services portfolio for the Romanian market 
-  Customer Empathy Mapping: Built the expansion strategy to Romania and created a digital marketing campaign with a good market penetration
- Online Marketing for the Romanian online franchise platform and introduced the Romanian version of the franchise portal franchising.info.ro
- Consultancy in strategic business start-up and market development
- Operations Management: HR recruitment, training and coaching, legal, budgeting and financial management

PROFIT system is a consulting company specialized in franchise consultancy in Central and Eastern European countries (esp. Poland, Ukraine, Czech Republic). We provide a wide range of services and products in the field of franchise business. We give full support in development of our Clients' businesses across Central and Eastern Europe.http://franchise2profit.com/
PROFIT system is also a publisher of franchise magazine in Czech Republic (Vlastní firma FRANCHISING), Poland (Własny Biznes FRANCHISING) and Ukraine (Идеи Бизнеса ФРАНЧАЙЗИНГ) and professional franchise portals in Poland,  Czech Republic, Hungary, Romania, Russia, Serbia and Ukraine.

volunteer_experiences.description:
Location: Malimbe, Tanzania
Tackling SDG no 4: Quality Education and no 10 Reduce Inequalities 
I went to volunteer for an educational NGO which was providing books in English and solar panels with light bulbs in order to enable children and different households to continue their education outside schools.
My role was teaching English in the rural area schools and training the NGO volunteers to maximize their impact on local level

Location: Warsaw, Poland
Tackling SDG no 10 Reduce Inequalities
Volunteering at the Stowarzyszenie "Otwarte Drzwi" Teaching & supporting NGO reintegration programs (rehabilitation center for former addicts and convicts)
